resources.string: Welcome to Penguin flight!\n Want to get trained?
Training is disabled. You can always enable it in the settings menu.
Now in front of you is the main window of the game. Here your penguin will try to fly higher and higher.

When you press this button, your penguin will start preparing for flight. At the very beginning, your penguin is not yet able to fly, so when the preparation time for the flight expires, he will only jump up.

Keep pressing the takeoff button to increase the concentration of the penguin. The higher the concentration at the time of takeoff, the higher the penguin will jump. The concentration level is displayed as a yellow bar under the penguin.
When a penguin is in the air, the altitude it has reached is displayed above its head.
When the penguin is back on the ground, the height record will be updated and displayed on the scoreboard Max:__.
To fly even higher you need to improve your penguin. To go to the upgrade menu, click on this button.
The upgrade menu contains all the ways to make your penguin stronger.
By training, your penguin can improve his performance. At the beginning, you can only increase the power of the jump.

To open any training, you need to set a height record. Start any training to continue learning. If there are no workouts available, return to the main window and reach the required record, try to keep your concentration at the highest possible level.
When the penguin is training, the remaining time is displayed instead of concentration.
During training, you can cheer the penguin by pressing this button. Each press will reduce the workout time by the set amount.
